snippet: Turkey lifted a ban on flights to Tel Aviv's Ben Gurion airport after a ceasefire was agreed between Israelis and Palestinians, the state's SHGM aviation authority said on Saturday....

headline.print_headline: Turkey, Citing Ceasefire, Lifts Flight Ban to Israel's Ben Gurion Airport
headline.main: Turkey, Citing Ceasefire, Lifts Flight Ban to Israel's Ben Gurion Airport

lead_paragraph: Turkey lifted a ban on flights to Tel Aviv's Ben Gurion airport after a ceasefire was agreed between Israelis and Palestinians, the state's SHGM aviation authority said on Saturday.
